title: 2026 is going to be a very painful year in tech
tags: Asus confirms their prices will rise in 2026;Dell prices could go up 10-30%;All PC prices to rise 8% in 2026, some pre-built PCs shipping without RAM;Sony likely delaying PS6 until 2029 due to cost/inventory;Switch 2 price hike likely;Lenovo and HP expect prices to jump upwards of 20%
